labels.label:
QueryMarkLogic is configured to read from the "nifi-data" collection.
You can use the PutMarkLogic flow (available from the top level of the
canvas) to generate some documents in that collection which can then
be queried via this flow.

labels.label:
You can modify the script body of the ExecuteScriptMarkLogic
processor to see how results are sent to different LogAttribute
processors based on whether or not the script succeeds.

Before trying any of these flows, deploy the test application
per the "Running the tests" instructions in the
marklogic-nifi CONTRIBUTING file.


The output of most flows can be observed via tailing the NiFi log files;
see the CONTRIBUTING file for instructions on doing that.
